scripts.test: ./bin/startup && docker-compose -f docker-compose.zapp.yml run zapp npx mocha --exit --require @babel/register 'orchestration/test.mjs'
scripts.retest: docker-compose -f docker-compose.zapp.yml run zapp npx mocha --exit --require @babel/register 'orchestration/test.mjs'
scripts.restart: docker-compose -f docker-compose.zapp.yml restart && docker compose -f docker-compose.zapp-double.yml logs -f -n 1000 zapp zokrates timber
scripts.apitest: ./bin/setup && ./bin/startup && docker-compose -f docker-compose.zapp.yml run --name apiservice -d -p 3000:3000 zapp node orchestration/api.mjs
